::DrillBit::

DrillBit heard her say she loved him. He liked hearing that, but he was
a little worryed about her. Why did she say it like that, in battle, was
she planing something, that was going to hurt her? 
"And you know I love you." He said.
"Dont let them get to you. Stay behind the iron door for cover."
